definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
smoke and baking fire (idiom); surrounded by flames and smoke

sentences.english: In this way Pingya's room had been fumigated before he was moved in.
sentences.chinese: 所以平亞搬進他的新屋子之前，也得要用煙燻。

sentences.english: The boys are seen with some style changes and dramatic smoky eye make up.
sentences.chinese: 男孩們看起來造型有了些變化，而且還化了煙燻妝。

sentences.english: Reduce edible salt bloats, smoke, barbecue food.
sentences.chinese: 減少食用鹽醃，煙燻，燒烤的食物。

sentences.english: The smoke made her eyes water.
The smoke almost choked the fireman.
sentences.chinese: 消防隊員幾乎被煙燻得透不過氣來。

sentences.english: Be like suffer sootiness and make partial wall paper becomes yellow, criterion appropriate is wiped with fluid of attenuant caustic soda.
sentences.chinese: 若受煙燻而使部分牆紙變黃，則宜用稀釋燒鹼液擦拭。

sentences.english: Fumigating the victims was considered necessary to cure fox bewitchment.’9
sentences.chinese: 煙燻這個受害者，被認爲是治療狐魅的必須。

sentences.english: Medium-bodied dry red wine, with nose of smoky currants, floral and mineral.
sentences.chinese: 中性酒體乾紅葡萄酒，富有煙燻，黑醋栗和花香氣味。

sentences.english: Liu's hands were black and her clothing reeked of smoke.
sentences.chinese: 劉潔的雙手漆黑，衣服都是煙燻的氣味。

sentences.english: The erysipelas organism is quite resistant to salting, pickling, and smoking.
sentences.chinese: 豬丹毒桿菌對鹽醃，酸浸，煙燻很有抵抗力。

sentences.english: Tarragon cured salmon carpaccio, lightly smoked, Williams pear puree, organic celery shoots.
sentences.chinese: 龍蒿草煙燻三文魚薄片，威廉生梨醬，有機西芹苗。

sentences.english: In the smoking process, squab ( squab ) meat becomes very soft , almost like paste.
sentences.chinese: 在煙燻加工中，雛鴿肉變得軟了，幾乎象膠水樣。

sentences.english: A firefighter was overcome by fumes at a blaze in a plastics factory.
sentences.chinese: 名消防隊員在一家塑料廠的火災中被煙燻倒了。

sentences.english: The hospital ward was fumigated after the outbreak of typhus.
sentences.chinese: 斑疹傷寒以後，醫院的病房進行煙燻消毒。

sentences.english: Two Eggs Scrambled with Smoked Salmon, topped with Sour Cream and Chives on an English Muffin.
sentences.chinese: 煙燻三文魚炒蛋，配以酸奶油，香蔥和英式鬆餅。

sentences.english: Basket is so dirty, Lotus also be smoked with a dirty-like.
sentences.chinese: 籮筐是那樣髒，蓮藕也跟被煙燻了似的髒兮兮的。

definition: to concoct by mixing ingredients/to prepare according to a recipe/to make (a salad, a cocktail, cosmetics etc)
